name: DisableRemoteVehicleCollisions
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3.7 and will not work in earlier versions!
description: Disables collisions between occupied vehicles for a player.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player for whom you want to disable collisions.

params_body.name: disable
params_body.description: 1 to disable collisions, 0 to enable collisions.

return_values: 0: The function failed to execute. The player specified does not exist.
